description:
Momoko and friends arrive on Onigashima.  They hurry to the core to take back the Michimi Peach, but are assaulted by a massive Oni army.  Momoko finally reaches the throne room, and meets Jakiou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saishuu Kessen! Momoko Tai Jaki Ou!!
The Last Battle! Momoko vs. Jakiou!!
最終決戦! 桃子対邪鬼王!!
